      static int serializeInt(java.lang.Integer i)
      Serialize int to use it in Inventories size ex. you have 38 kits and it will serialize it to 45 (9*5) because it is valid inventory size next ex. you have 55 items and it will serialize it to 63 (9*7) not 54 because it's too less

      • formatIntoMMSS

        public static java.lang.String formatIntoMMSS(int secsIn)
        Format seconds to mm:ss, ex 615 seconds 60:15 (60 minutes, 15 seconds)
        Parameters:

      • round

        public static double round(double value,
                           int places)
        Round double to x places, ex 1.321135 round to 2 places = 1.32
        Parameters:
        value - double to round
        places - how many places after dot/comma save
        Returns:
        rounded double value

      • serializeInt

        public static int serializeInt(java.lang.Integer i)
        Serialize int to use it in Inventories size ex. you have 38 kits and it will serialize it to 45 (9*5) because it is valid inventory size next ex. you have 55 items and it will serialize it to 63 (9*7) not 54 because it's too less
        Parameters:
        i - integer to serialize
        Returns:
        serialized number

      • spawnRandomFirework

        public static void spawnRandomFirework(org.bukkit.Location location)
        Spawns random firework at location
        Parameters:
        location - location to spawn firework there

      • getProgressBar

        public static java.lang.String getProgressBar(int current,
                                              int max,
                                              int totalBars,
                                              java.lang.String symbol,
                                              java.lang.String completedColor,
                                              java.lang.String notCompletedColor)
        Returns progress bar in a string. Whole code can be found https://www.spigotmc.org/threads/progress-bars-and-percentages.276020/
        Parameters:
        current - current percentage
        max - maximum percentage
        totalBars - maximum bars amount
        symbol - symbol of the bar (ex. '|')
        completedColor - color of completed bar
        notCompletedColor - color of not completed bar
        Returns:
        String with requested progress
